name: Bohan Zhuang
content: Bohan ZhuangA Good Man Follow Email Twitter Facebook LinkedIn Instagram Weibo Google ScholarI currently serve as a Research Professor at Zhejiang University and an Adjunct Faculty at Monash University. Previously, I was a tenured Assistant Professor at Monash University from 2020 to 2024.My research focuses on the co-design of efficient algorithms and systems for multimodal large foundation models.If you are interested in our lab, please fill the Google form.Opening Positions @ Zhejiang University: We are recruting Research Assistants throughout the year. If you wish to apply for a PhD or masterâ€™s program under my supervision for the 2027 intake, please join ZIP Lab in advance to participate in research.Our lab is actively pursuing collaborations with industry partners.
